text: Charlotte Corday is a 1919 German silent historical film directed by Frederic Zelnik and starring Lya Mara and Hermann Vallentin. No surviving copies are known. ==Cast== * Lya Mara as Charlotte Corday * Hermann Vallentin * Wiktor Biegański * Hermann Seldeneck ==References== ==Bibliography== * ==External links== * Category:1919 films Category:German films Category:Films of the Weimar Republic Category:Films directed by Frederic Zelnik Category:German silent feature films Category:German black-and-white films Category:French Revolution films Category:German historical films Category:1910s historical films
title: Charlotte Corday (1919 film)
